name: Cyclic Adventure (doublemizzlee)
description:
Cyclic Adventure is a puzzle platformer where death, doesn't necessarily mean game over.  Each level is unique and you are given a set amount of lives to complete the level in order to get to the exit. Each death respawns you at the beginning of the level, but leaves something behind to help you progress further. See how quickly you can complete the level and in how many lives!

Controls:
Keyboard:
Move: Left and Right Arrows
Jump: Up Arrow or Space

Controller:
Move: Left Joystick or D-pad
Jump: A Button
